extension-point.name: computer
extension-point.documentation:
Extension point to contribute an new class to compute virtual groups.
The contribution should be of the form :
fullClassName
The contributed class must implement the org.nuxeo.ecm.platform.computedgroups.GroupComputer interface.
@author Thierry Delprat (td@nuxeo.com)

extension-point.name: computerChain
extension-point.documentation:
Extension point to set or update the chain of group computer. The GroupComputers will be called sequentially accorting to the chain definition.
The contribution should be of the form :
companyGroupComputer myOtherGroupComputer
By default, each contribution will completly overwrite the chain. If you just want to add a new computer to the existing chain, set the append attribute to true.
myAdditionnalGroupComputer
@author Thierry Delprat (td@nuxeo.com)
